医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
第四频道《超级外科医生：生命的机会》新一季回归Wonderhood 的《超级外科医生：生命的机会》系列第二季将于 6 月 18 日播出，让观众独家了解世界领先的综合癌症中心皇家马斯登 NHS 基金会信托基金的幕后花絮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Super-Surgeons-A-Chance-at-Life-returns-with-new-season-on-Channel-4.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f2d779d-9628-42a7-92b5-565ae5b89b71 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:58:00 -0400 Super Surgeons: A Chance at Life returns with new season on Channel 4
瑞士新研究所将引领免疫工程和全球儿童健康“瑞士研究机构的成立专注于免疫工程和促进全球儿童和青少年健康。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/New-Swiss-research-institute-to-pioneer-immune-engineering-and-global-child-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/New-Swiss-research-institute-to-pioneer-immune-engineering-and-global-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97fd5f61-662a-49bd-9043-1e4fa8118af1 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:48:00 -0400 New Swiss research institute to pioneer immune engineering and global child health
研究表明坚果可以成为健康减肥计划的一部分无论是撒在早上的麦片上还是作为下午的零食，一把坚果可能是减肥的下一个最佳选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Nuts-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-plan-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Nuts-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-plan-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6256ca97-5cda-42ec-a984-1941a3d1a89c Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:36:00 -0400 Nuts can be part of a healthy weight loss plan, study shows
新型人工智能工具有望重塑早期药物发现中的虚拟筛选由莫纳什大学领导的澳大利亚研究人员发明了一种新的人工智能（AI）工具，该工具有望重塑早期药物发现中的虚拟筛选，并增强科学家识别潜在新药的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Novel-AI-tool-poished-to-reshape-virtual-screening-in-early-stage-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Novel-AI-tool-poished-to-reshape-virtual-screening-in-early-stage-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51736d70-d553-4770-a5ca-ce97c2ac411c Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:32:00 -0400 Novel AI tool poised to reshape virtual screening in early stage drug discovery
研究人员提出了一种“蛋白质聚集时钟”来测量衰老和健康测量细胞中的蛋白质团块是否可以成为找出罹患与年龄相关疾病的风险的新方法？美因茨约翰内斯古腾堡大学 (JGU) 的 Dorothee Dormann 教授和 Edward Lemke 教授（同时也是美因茨分子生物学研究所 (IMB) 的兼职主任）提出了“蛋白质聚集时钟”的概念，用于测量衰老和健康状况新观点文章发表在《自然细胞生物学》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Researchers-propose-a- Protein-aggregation-clock-to-measure-aging-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Researchers-propose-a- Protein-aggregation-clock-to-measure-aging-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ac03cbc-fa26-4396-a110-f0b23aaf4d2e Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:27:00 -0400 Researchers propose a 'protein aggregation clock' to measure aging and health
靶向DUSP6蛋白预防乳腺癌复发多年来，乳腺癌的治疗效果已经有所改善，但即使在体内没有癌症潜伏迹象很长时间后，乳腺癌的比例仍然会复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Targeting-DUSP6- Protein-to-prevent-breast-cancer-recurrence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Targeting-DUSP6- Protein-to-prevent-breast-cancer-recurrence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8158756-7411-4556-b69c-007c78b372ea Wed, 19 Jun 2024 02:22:00 -0400 Targeting DUSP6 protein to prevent breast cancer recurrence
研究显示胰腺癌患者术前化疗的有效性一组国际研究人员今天在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上发表的一项新研究提供了关于在手术切除肿瘤之前使用化疗（联合或不联合放射治疗）治疗胰腺癌患者的有效性的最新数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-efficiency-of-treating-pancreatic-cancer-患者-with-chemotherapy-before-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-effectness-of-treating-pancreatic-cancer-患者-with-chemotherapy-before-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0fcaaa5-d6d8-4c72-a5ee-b36de85010e4 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 00:34:25 -0400 Study shows effectiveness of treating pancreatic cancer patients with chemotherapy before surgery
新研究表明，心理健康对健康老龄化至关重要《自然人类行为》杂志上的一项研究发现，心理健康对健康老龄化有因果影响，与社会经济地位无关，更好的心理健康与改善老龄化结果相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mental-well-being-crucial-for-healthy-aging-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Mental-well-being-crucial-for-healthy-aging-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e5b631b-eed1-4d53-9d04-6a2a9182a135 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Mental well-being crucial for healthy aging, new study reveals
研究表明疫苗可以降低长期感染新冠病毒的风险，特别是对于那些已有疾病的人《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版的一项研究发现，女性和患有心血管疾病的个人更有可能长期感染新冠病毒，但接种疫苗，尤其是多次接种疫苗，可以显着降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-shows-vaccines-cut-long-COVID-risk-special-for-those-with-preexisting-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-shows-vaccines-cut-long-COVID-risk-special-for-those-with-preexisting-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aff61b8-3044-44cd-ae0d-68f835fbe804 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:24:00 -0400 Study shows vaccines cut long COVID risk, especially for those with preexisting conditions
研究揭示乳腺癌患者的持久生活质量不平等在健康方面，乳腺癌女性在各个层面都存在不平等：预防、筛查、诊断、治疗和生存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-reveals- permanent-quality-of-life-inequities-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-reveals- permanent-quality-of-life-inequities-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac9f85a-8cd0-4792-88bc-3586cba2b15e Tue, 18 Jun 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Study reveals lasting quality of life inequities in breast cancer patients
